info.description: The shop API empowers developers to build amazing new apps or websites using Zalando shop data and services.
info.title: Zalando Shop

Required if articleId is empty.
parameters.name: articleModelId

get.description:
Search for articles based on various different possible filter like e.g. the `brandFamily`, the `catagory` or a
specific `color`. See [Filters](https://todo) for a list of all available filter options.

The default `pageSize` for responses is set to `20`. You can add a `pageSize` request parameter to adjust that.
Please keep in mind that the maximum `pageSize` for this resource is `200`.

The endpoint also supports reducing the fields returned for each article via the `fields` parameter. Please
refer to [fields parameter](https://todo) for more details.

acceptLanguage.description:
Specify which Shop to use.

A standard `Accept-Language` header which specifies the shop that should be used. E.g. `de-DE` will use the German
shop (as does [https://www.zalando.de](https://www/zalando.de) and `de-AT` will use the Austrian one.

The shop choosen will e.g. define the currency used for prices as well as the language for product names and
descriptions. Furthermore it will impact which articles are available as they might differ between countries.
acceptLanguage.name: Accept-Language

activationDate.description: period or time the articles are activated for selling in the shop
activationDate.name: activationDate

articleId.description:
The `articleIds` to use use for filtering.

One or more `articleIds` might be used as a filter criteria. Submit multiple `articleId` request parameters for
more than one to be used. They will be treated as `OR` criteria.
articleId.name: articleId

articleReviewSort.description: articles are sorted on reviews provided by customers (eg: best)
articleReviewSort.name: sort

assortmentArea.description: filters by classification of articles (eg: maternity)
assortmentArea.name: assortmentArea

brand.description: filters by brand key given by user (eg: SA5)
brand.name: brand

brandfamily.description: filters by brand family key (eg: nike)
brandfamily.name: brandfamily

category.description: filters by category (eg: Socks, Rain Coats)
category.name: category

fields.description:
Comma separated list of fields that should be returned. Fields of subobjects are specified with dots as separator. Fields of objects within lists are specified in the same way.

Example: id,name,brand.key,brand.name, units.id,units.size,units.price.formatted
fields.name: fields

filling.description: filters by different kinds of garment filling materials (eg: satin, wolle)
filling.name: filling

fullText.description: filters by text (eg: search by 'as' gives result with articles of brand Sass)
fullText.name: fullText

heelHeight.description: filters by height of the heel size or length (eg: xs)
heelHeight.name: heelHeight

length.description: filters by garments length (eg: 3/4 length, knee-length)
length.name: length

maxStarRating.description: To get reviews with maximum star rating.
maxStarRating.name: maxStarRating

minStarRating.description: To get reviews with minimum star rating.
minStarRating.name: minStarRating

occasion.description: filters by type of occasion (eg: party, business)
occasion.name: occasion

page.description: to request with required page number or pagination
page.name: page

pageSize.description: to request with required page size in a page
pageSize.name: pageSize

pattern.description: filters by pattern on the garments (eg: animal print, plain)
pattern.name: pattern

price.description: filters all articles in price range (eg: 9-90)
price.name: price

sale.description: filters discounted articles marked as sale
sale.name: sale

shaftHeight.description: filters by shaft height (eg: s, xs)
shaftHeight.name: shaftHeight

shaftWidth.description: filters by shaft width (eg: s, l)
shaftWidth.name: shaftWidth

shirtCollar.description: filters by shirt collar styles (eg: low V neck, lined collar)
shirtCollar.name: shirtCollar

shoeFastener.description: filters by shoe fastener types (eg: buckle, lacing)
shoeFastener.name: shoeFastener

shoeToecap.description: filters by shoe toe cap variants (eg: pointed, square)
shoeToecap.name: shoeToecap

sports.description: filters by different sport activities (eg: football)
sports.name: sports

technology.description: filters by technology used to produce the articles
technology.name: technology

upperMaterial.description: filters by different type of upper material used on garments (eg: lace)
upperMaterial.name: upperMaterial

activationDate.description: timestamp the article was available in the Zalando webshop

additionalInfos.description: any additional information of the article

ageGroups.description: age group of the article belongs to

available.description: will be true if at least one article unit is available

categoryKeys.description: category keys of the article belongs to

color.description: the main color of the article

genders.description: gender of the article belongs to

season.description: collection season the article belongs to

seasonYear.description: collection year the article belongs to. Could be either a year or 'ALL'

shopUrl.description: url of the article within the Zalando webshop

largeHdUrl.description: large HD image of the article

mediumHdUrl.description: medium HD image of the article

smallHdUrl.description: small HD image of the article

thumbnailHdUrl.description: thumbnail HD url of the article images

type.description: model or non model type article images

created.description: article review created date and time

customerCity.description: customer city in the article review

customerCountry.description: customer country in the article review

customerNickname.description: Customer short name in the article review

helpfulCount.description: customer review helpful count of the article

unhelpfulCount.description: customer review unhelpful count of the article

Article-Reviews.description: Zalando API Paged Article Reviews Schema

Article-Reviews-Summaries.description: Zalando API Paged Article Reviews Summaries Schema

Article-Reviews-Summary.description: Zalando API Article Reviews Summary Schema

averageStarRating.description: average star rating of the article

numberOfUserPositiveRecommendations.description: number of positive recommendations to the article

numberOfUserRecommendations.description: number of users recommended to the article

numberOfUserReviews.description: number of user reviews of the article

starRatingDistribution.description: start rating distribution of the article

partnerId.description: partner id (vendor id) of the article

Articles.description: A simple container object that carries paging information as well as a list of articles on the `content` property.

key.description: The unique key for a brand

logoLargeUrl.description: The url of the large brand logo within the Zalando web shop

logoUrl.description: The url of the brand logo within the Zalando web shop

shopUrl.description: The url of the brand within the Zalando web shop

key.description: The unique key for a brandFamily

shopUrl.description: The url of the brandFamily within the Zalando web shop

childKeys.description: The list of keys of the child categories

cid.description: The numeric ID for a category.

hidden.description: The category is hidden and not shown on the Zalando web shop

key.description: The unique key for a category

outlet.description: Containing articles are from last seasons

parentKey.description: The key of the parent category

suggestedFilters.description: list of filter names that are reasonable to use within this category

targetGroup.description: The target group of the articles from this category

facets.description: list of the calculated article counts for each filter value

count.description: number of articles matching this filter value

multiValue.description: can this filter be used multiple times with different values in one search request

name.description: The unique name for a filter

values.description: only if type is 'enum' this list contains all possible filter values

key.description: The key for a filterValue. Only unique within one filter

size.description: total number of elements in a page

totalPages.description: total number of pages in the response
